content: The notes on the parchment don't give any indication about which door to take next. They only provide instructions for navigating the forest path shown on the map. You look around the corridor, but there is no obvious direction to take. The distant sounds seem to be coming from one of the doors further down the hall, but you can't tell which one. You realize that you must rely on your intuition and choose a door to explore. Which door will you choose?
